channel.title: CVE Feed for Grafana -- worldmap-panel
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Grafana -- worldmap-panel

item.title: CVE-2023-3010|2024-06-04T17:17:33.636Z -- grafana -- worldmap-panel
item.description:
Grafana is an open-source platform for monitoring and observability.
The WorldMap panel plugin, versions before 1.0.4 contains a DOM XSS vulnerability.
